bridge_paragraph: These early leadership and engineering experiences at Compuware, Soave, and John Deere built my foundation in automated quality, scalable architecture, and continuous integration—skills that now underpin my work in AI-driven software delivery systems.

certifications.name: ICAgile Certified Professional - Agile Team Facilitation
ICAgile Certified Professional - Foundations of DevOps
ICAgile Certified Professional - Business Agility Foundations

core_competencies: Strategic Leadership: Technology Roadmapping, Organizational Alignment, Executive Partnership, Cost Optimization
Architecture & Cloud: AWS, Azure, Terraform, Serverless, Kubernetes, Hybrid Cloud, Infrastructure Modernization
AI & Automation: LLM Integration, Predictive Analytics, Process Automation (RPA), Data Pipelines, MLOps
Security & Compliance: AES-256, KeeperSecurity, DevSecOps, SOC2, Risk & Access Management
People & Delivery Leadership: Agile/SAFe Coaching, Team Building, Mentorship, KPI-Driven Governance

bullets.text: Directed cloud transformation and automation strategy across multiple AI services, introducing Terraform-driven IaC for AWS Lambda and API Gateway ecosystems.
Integrated KeeperSecurity-managed AES-256 encryption for tokenized data handling, aligning with enterprise compliance and security frameworks.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and IaC validation, achieving 100 % parity between staging and production environments.
Partnered with executives to identify cost-reduction and scalability opportunities through compute optimization and automated infrastructure management.
Mentored engineers and architects on secure coding, DevSecOps principles, and AI model lifecycle management.

experience.role: Principal Consultant / Platform Team Delivery Lead – Digital Client Experience

bullets.text: Led modernization of the enterprise Online Access platform, transitioning from monolithic systems to microservices and micro-frontends across AWS and Azure.
Established technology governance frameworks and DevOps metrics across 13 Agile teams, accelerating releases by 50 %.
Partnered with product leadership to align modernization OKRs with business strategy, improving reliability and performance.
Designed observability dashboards (Dynatrace, Splunk) and automated alerts to monitor API performance and AI model integrity.
Drove cross-functional collaboration between engineering, operations, and leadership to achieve business-driven technology alignment.
Founded and led modernization initiatives delivering AI-driven SaaS and automation platforms for healthcare and finance clients.
Developed the RenderX orchestration platform, a JSON-driven, plugin-based architecture that unified data pipelines and AI automation.
Built secure data and automation services integrating RPA, ETL, and ML inference, achieving > 300 % process efficiency improvement for client operations.
Implemented SOC2-aligned DevSecOps pipelines with predictive analytics and cost optimization via Terraform and CloudWatch metrics.
Directed a cross-functional engineering team, fostering innovation and accountability through continuous delivery and measurable performance KPIs.
Designed and deployed hybrid AWS EC2 cloud infrastructure, replacing aging on-prem systems across 25 U.S. sites.
Introduced Infrastructure-as-Code automation and proactive monitoring, cutting IT costs by $250 K annually.
Partnered with executives to define technology roadmaps aligned with financial objectives and organizational scalability.
Unified ERP subsystems under a single enterprise platform using MVVM and service-oriented design.
Modernized ERP systems supporting 400+ retail sites, integrating continuous integration pipelines and secure financial microservices.
Designed Level III–certified payment microservices that processed $1 M+ daily, saving $500 K annually through secure automation.
Cultivated engineering standards emphasizing reliability, scalability, and developer accountability—precursors to full DevOps adoption.
Focused on strategies to reduce AI compute costs while improving throughput and reliability of cloud-native systems.
Prototyped cost-aware orchestration frameworks in AWS Lambda and ECS that right-size compute resources in real time based on workload intensity.
Experimented with hardware-aware model batching, caching, and queue-based scheduling, demonstrating up to 40 % reduction in inference cost per transaction.
Applied lessons learned to design sustainable AI architectures balancing efficiency, scalability, and fault tolerance for production-grade public-safety environments.
Developed web-based financial and compliance applications integrating Salesforce, AWS, and internal data systems.
Established CI/CD pipelines with automated testing and trunk-based branching, reducing manual deployment steps by > 60 %.
Mentored junior developers on modern DevOps, continuous testing, and microservice decomposition.
Engineered enterprise-scale QA automation and load-testing frameworks (QALoad, QADirector) used by clients such as Ford, GM, and Blue Cross, standardizing test execution across distributed systems.
Developed E2E automation frameworks in C++ and Java that integrated performance testing directly into the earliest DevOps pipelines.
Automated defect-tracking and regression testing processes, increasing release velocity and reliability for large-scale automotive and healthcare platforms.
Created internal performance benchmarking utilities that evolved into global commercial QA products, improving observability and continuous feedback for engineering teams.
Collaborated across dev, QA, and product teams to institutionalize continuous testing culture that predated modern CI/CD adoption.

Developed next-generation diagnostic tools for OEM clients including Harley-Davidson, Isuzu, and Penske, enabling technicians to analyze, calibrate, and service vehicles through dynamic data interfaces.

Engineered data-driven diagnostic frameworks in C and C++ for multiple communication protocols (J1850, J1939, CAN, ISO 9141), ensuring real-time vehicle data acquisition and cross-platform compatibility.

Designed modular ECM communication libraries capable of detecting and adapting to new OEM protocols without re-engineering the core stack — a precursor to today's plugin and microservice architectures.
Collaborated with firmware and field engineering teams to validate tool accuracy and performance across diverse vehicle ECUs, integrating live telemetry capture and automated fault detection.
Implemented early test-automation suites for calibration and service modules, reducing regression time and establishing repeatable quality benchmarks adopted across client programs.
Authored internal documentation and training materials to standardize diagnostic protocol handling, accelerating onboarding for new engineers and OEM partners.

experience.role: Software Engineer – Vehicle Diagnostics & Embedded Systems

bullets.text: Contributed to the development of embedded diagnostic software and communication utilities for heavy-duty and automotive OEMs including GM, Freightliner, and Detroit Diesel, forming the basis of what became Nexiq's flagship USB Link diagnostic interface.
Developed C++ modules for ECM/TCM communication supporting multiple transport layers (J1850 VPW, PWM, CAN, ISO 9141, and J1939) used in early vehicle network testing tools.
Assisted in implementing protocol parsers, data loggers, and error-code interpreters, enabling real-time fault detection and calibration analysis across multiple vehicle control modules.
Collaborated with senior firmware engineers to integrate embedded serial communication stacks and perform bench validation using oscilloscopes, breakout boxes, and early CAN analyzers.
Supported initial automation of test workflows through batch scripting and unit harnesses, reducing manual regression validation time by over 30%.
Documented diagnostic APIs and assisted in preparing SDK materials for OEM and aftermarket developers.

experience.role: Junior Software Developer – Vehicle Communications & Diagnostics

name: Sidney Jones
summary: Visionary technology leader and enterprise architect with 20+ years of experience driving digital transformation, cloud modernization, and AI-driven automation across multiple industries including SaaS, financial, and healthcare. Proven record aligning technology strategy with business outcomes, implementing secure, scalable architectures, and mentoring high-performing engineering teams. Expert in process improvement, SOC2-aligned governance, and DevSecOps execution, consistently improving uptime, reducing compute costs, and accelerating innovation through automation, analytics, and AI orchestration. Known for transforming complex legacy systems into modern, cost-efficient platforms that enable sustainable growth and competitive advantage.

technical_proficiencies.architecture: Scalable Microservices, High-Availability APIs, Event-Driven Systems, Serverless Applications
technical_proficiencies.cloud_devops: AWS (Lambda, API Gateway, S3), Azure Functions, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps
technical_proficiencies.core_languages: C#, Python, Java, SQL, JavaScript (React, Node.js)
technical_proficiencies.security_compliance: AES-256, KeeperSecurity Vault, Role-Based Access Control, DevSecOps, CI/CD Scanning

title: Lead Software Engineer & Cloud Architect
